		<span id="dnn_ctr5717_Viewer_lblContent"><h1><strong>meet our industry partners<br /> </strong></h1> <div id="partnersSlides"><a href="/partners/ford"><img height="259" width="453" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/Logos/BMW/BMWsliderAuto.jpg" rel="BMW" alt="" /></a><a href="/partners/mercedes-benz"><img height="259" width="453" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UserContent/images/IP_Mercedes.jpg" rel="MercedesBenz" alt="" /></a><a href="/partners/nascar"><img height="259" width="453" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UserContent/images/IP_NASCAR.jpg" rel="NASCAR_caption" alt="" /></a><a href="/partners/harley-davidson"><img height="259" width="453" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/UTI_EDU_DNN/Home/MeetOurEmployers/HarleyDavidson.jpg" rel="HarleyDavidson" alt="" /></a><a href="/partners/honda-motorcycle"><img height="259" width="453" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UserContent/images/IP_HondaMoto.jpg" rel="Honda" alt="" /></a><a href="/partners/yamaha-motorcycle"><img height="259" width="453" src="http://cdn.uti.edu/EDUWebsiteContent/UserContent/images/IP_Suzuki.jpg" rel="Suzuki" alt="" /></a></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="Ford"> <p>A trusted American manufacturer for more than 100 years, Ford has hired 6,045 UTI graduates, and counting.</p> </div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="Toyota"> <p>Toyota, one of the world’s most popular automotive manufacturers, has hired 2,886 UTI graduates and continues to be a top employer.</p> </div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="Nissan"><p>Get extensive opportunities for hands-on experience with a variety of Nissan and Infiniti vehicles, systems, and components.</p></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="BMW"><p>Graduates of this program get the opportunity to work with the most advanced cars in the world. See how you can too with more information on our BMW training program.</p></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="MercedesBenz"><p>In Mercedes-Benz ELITE <i>START</i>, you&#39;ll receive hands-on training to diagnose and repair some of the brand&#39;s most advanced automobiles.</p></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="NASCAR_caption"><p>UTI is the exclusive educational provider for NASCAR and the only campus in the country to offer NASCAR technician training.</p></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="HarleyDavidson"> <p>Harley Davidson has hired 10,640 UTI graduates, who personally get the opportunity to experience the power behind the legendary name.</p> </div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="Honda"><p>Earn your Honda Pro Technician Routine Maintenance Certificate and become a registered HONDA Bronze Level Technician with this top-notch training in MMI's Honda HonTech® Elective.</p></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="Yamaha"><p>In Yamaha YamaPro®, you'll earn your Yamaha Silver Level Technician Certificate &amp; work on models such as the YZF-R, YZ-F &amp; Star as well as ATVs, UTV's, &amp; more.</p></div><div class="o-slider-captions" id="Suzuki"><p>In Factory Authorized Suzuki Training (FAST), you'll earn your Suzuki Pro Bronze Recognition and get top-notch training on the latest Suzuki models including the GSX-R sportbike series, RM-Z, &amp; more.</p></div></span>
	</div><div id="dnn_ctr5717_Viewer_UP_Prog" style="display:none;">
